def_cn: （身体或身体某部位）肿胀的，膨胀的，发胀的
def_en: If someone's body or a part of their body is bloated, it is much larger than normal, usually because it has a lot of liquid or gas inside it.
If you feel bloated after eating a large meal, you feel very full and uncomfortable.

def_cn: （机构）臃肿的，人浮于事的
def_en: If you describe an organization as bloated, you mean that it is larger and less efficient than it should be.
